definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: former, eastern (on format. v. Lag:BN 195 Ba:NB, § 227d);—abs. ´[[ק]]: 1Sa 24:14 (Gi v:1Sa 24:13), Jn 2:20; [[מוֹנִי]]- Ez Eze 10:19 +; mpl. [[קַדְמׂנִים]] Job 18:20, [[מוֹנִים]]- Ez Eze 38:17; fpl. [[קַדְמׂנִיּוֹת]] Is 43:18, Mal 3:4;—

former, ancient, ´[[יׇמִים ק]]: Ez Eze 38:17 former days; ´[[שָׁנִים ק]]: Mal 3:4 (‖[[יְמֵי עוֹלָם ]]): fpl. as n., former things Is 43:18 (‖[[רִאשׁׂנוֹת ]]); ms. as n. coll. [[מְשַׁל]] [[הַקַּדְמׂנִי]] 1Sa 24:14 a proverb of the ancients.

eastern: of [[שַׁעַר]] Ez Eze 10:19, Eze 11:1, (i.e. Dead Sea) Eze 47:18 and (opp. [[הַיׇּם הָאַחֲרוֹן]]) Zec 14:8, Jn 2:20; mpl. as n. Easterns, those of the E. (opp. W) Job 18:20 (so Ew De Hi Di Bae Du; Vrss earlier and later, so Da al. [both future], Bu former generations [now in Shₑ’ôl], and future).
